title: internal compiler error: syslook: can't find runtime.convE2E
body:
by **fibercut**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?

package main

type (
	a interface{}
	b interface{}
)

func main() {
	x := a(1)
	z := b(x)
	_ = z
}

What is the expected output?
the above code should compile (AFAIK)

What do you see instead?
main.go:10: internal compiler error: syslook: can't find runtime.convE2E

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g, 8g

Which operating system are you using?
linux (2.6.35-24-generic #42-Ubuntu SMP)

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
cd89452cfea3 weekly/weekly.2011-04-04
also 67f65b5f3904 tip
